original_text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were uneducated, common men, they were astonished. And they recognized that they had been with Jesus.
korean_text: 그들이 베드로와 요한이 담대하게 말함을 보고 그들을 본래 학문 없는 범인으로 알았다가 이상히 여기며 또 전에 예수와 함께 있던 줄도 알고

sentences.original_text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 베드로와 요한의 담대함을 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: and perceived that they were uneducated,
that they had been with Jesus.
